appDesc.message: E hana i nā pane pau ʻole mai ChatGPT ʻike āpau (ma kekahi ʻōlelo!)

prompt_updateReplyLang.message: Hōʻano hou i ka ʻōlelo pane

prompt_updateReplyInt.message: Hoʻohou i ka wā pane (ka liʻiliʻi he 5 kekona)

alert_willReplyIn.message: E pane mai ʻo ChatGPT Infinity

alert_willReplyEvery.message: E pane ʻo ChatGPT Infinity i kēlā me kēia
